text: Is anyone using child themes on live sites? Although it’s still technically in beta I wonder if it’s base features are strong enough to use in production?
I have a few customers who use CLEAN starting to use it. The child theme's MVP is mostly there but it's still a little glitchy.
Thanks Kevin - that’s what it seemed like to me. But I just wanted to see if anyone out in the world was Bangin away on it already in production mode haha. Thanks for the input!
